summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1948, for the improvement of Rainier Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Walden Street to Genesee Street, by laying water mains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all appurtenances necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 20123, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
